SA10n1019:4: alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kkacit |
SA10n1019:10: tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate |
SA10n1019:14: tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam |
SA10n1019:15: ākāśam ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye pare ||7 ||
SA10n1019:16: astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ |
SA10n1019:17: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam ||8 ||
